testsuite.name: Computhink.Script.Split_Merge_Documents
testsuite.system-out: Scenario 01: Log into a EWA Enter valid user name into username field UserName Details: Dipak Enter valid password into password field Select a Room Selected Room name: demoserver.demoroom Captcha is not present, proceeding with login. Click Login button Session for user is already active. Do you want to create a new session? Dialog box displayed. User clicks OK button. Session message did not appear. Proceeding with login. User has logged in successfully.

Test Scenario 1: Verifying Create new documents for Split & Merge Click on Refresh button Click on Setting Icon Click on My preferences option Select Office document and set Default view Option Select Pdf document and set Default view Option Click on Apply button Click on New Document Tab Click on Destination Folder Checkbox Expand a cabinet Expand a drawer select a folder Click on Ok button Select Document type dropdown value Enter value into Report name field Browse Document page By using AutoIT add file from external folder Click on Create button Click on View document option Document is created successfully
Test Scenario 3: Verify selected page is pdf or not and do Split All pages for pdf document Number of files present: 4
